task_background: Prepare the commercial production studio for a live shoot by setting up equipment, organizing props, and ensuring all technical systems are operational.

tasks.task_description: Place the boom_microphone_1 on the audio_mixer_board_1.
Find the heaviest, aluminum lighting rig and turn it on.
Use the spray_bottle_1 to clean the dirty green screen panel.
Find the largest, wooden furniture in the living room set and turn on the faux fireplace inside it.
